# AliceToolsProxiesExtensions.TryGetLibiconvFriendlyName method

Try get libiconv friendly name.

```csharp
public static bool TryGetLibiconvFriendlyName(this Encoding encoding, out string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| encoding | encoding. |
| name | If succeed, returns the libiconv friendly name. |

## Return Value

`true` if succeed, otherwise, `false`.
